snippet: The French public and news media were closely following the case against Franck Ribéry and Karim Benzema, who are accused of paying an under-age girl for sex.
abstract: French public and news media are closely following case against soccer players Franck Ribery and Karim Benzema, who are accused of paying an under-age girl Zahia Dehar for sex.

byline.original: By STEVEN ERLANGER and MAÏA de la BAUME

lead_paragraph: The French public and news media were closely following the case against Franck Ribéry and Karim Benzema, who are accused of paying an under-age girl for sex.

headline.main: Soccer Stars Are at Center of Paris Prostitution Case
headline.print_headline: Soccer Stars Are at Center of Paris Prostitution Case
